MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Bumpers Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.15am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:16am on the 28th April 2021.
